titles.title: Border Security and Enforcement Block Grant Act of 2024
Border Security and Enforcement Block Grant Act of 2024
To direct the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to establish the Border Security and Enforcement Block Grant Program.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Emergency Management and Technology.

Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committee on Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
